effect.@en: Until fully Recuperated, you cannot use any weapon with an Encumbrance Value of 2 or more, as you’re in pain. You must undergo a successful surgery or suffer the consequences. Once a Maimed Foot has undergone a failed surgery, you lose 1D6-1 toes. For every toe lost, you permanently lose 1% Brawn. If you lose all toes, you gain the Veteran’s Boot Drawback. If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Brawn.
